name: Illuminate (Muhammad Izha B Rahim)
description:
This game is made within 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018:
https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/illuminate

ILLUMINATE is a physics-based, two-player versus game.
Your objective is to hit the Yellow orb to score points.
But to do that, you need to hold the White orb first.
First person to get the most points wins.

You can download the source code using the link above.
